long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FREE DURING BETA PERIOD

The extension allows users to unlock the Global Header and the Tabs components for Salesforce Lightning experience. They become relative to the page and don’t stick to the top. As a result, it unleashes 87px on large screens and 137px on small screens.

On a record detail page, the app un-fix the Highlights Panel and unleashes an extra 68px on the screen. Totally, it’s 155px on large screens and 205px on small screens. For the Full HD resolution, it’s the fifth part of the screen.
